drenders.command.help.title: Debug Renderers command help!
drenders.command.alloff.help:
Usage: /drenderers allof
Description: Disables all debug renderers
drenders.command.toggle.help:
Usage: /drenderers toggle <renderer>
Description: Toggles the state of any give renderer
drenders.command.clear.help:
Usage: /drenderers clear
Description: Resets the data for all renderers
drenders.command.reset.ok: Reset the state of all renderers!
